column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The food was the biggest disappointment ever! When I think of a good bowl of ramen consists of there things: good tasty flavorful broth
column2: perfectly cooked noodles and a perfectly cooked egg. However the ramen I got had a very weak broth
column3: because of the Brussels sprouts it really ruined the both taste. The noodles were okay
column4: but the EGG. Omg the egg was the worst thing ever. It tasted like someone just hard boiled an egg and then slapped some soy sauce on it. I can make a wayyy better egg than that. I expected a standardized ramen egg to have good seasoning and the inside yolk to be perfectly cook - kinda soft but NOT HARD BOILED which is what I got!!
